overview:
Paul Pechin has extensive experience in the dynamic web development sector of software development. He specializes in Rich Internet Applications and dynamic programming languages. His programming experience is ranged by languages including C++, Java, Ruby on Rails, and Flex 3. Mr. Pechin plays an integral role in Myriad’s strategic direction, development, and future growth planning.

Mr. Pechin leads the execution of strategy for technology platforms, partnerships, and external relationships. He builds and manages a top-flight technology team and oversees research and development as well as project management, providing visible leadership for the company within the technology community. He anticipates and reacts to major technology changes to ensure Myriad Tech’s leadership in the competitive and ever-changing web landscape.
